thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Lee Neylon

author: Lee Neylon
title: Lee Neylon
text:
Fairly fast transfer, even using bpay option for the first step to transfer from my notoriously slow Australian bank to Currency Fair. Very fast onward transfer from CF to my target account in the UK. On previous occasions transferring funds between the same accounts the whole process in a single step from my bank to the UK bank was possibly marginally faster.
But also much more expensive in terms of exchange rate (rip off) and processing fees!
This was painless, if you can afford to wait about 3 days for it to go through.
